main event: A civilian observed a bright light in the sky over Berea, Ohio on September 21, 1964.
interesting points: The light was flashing on and off and moved at a terrific speed from east to west., The object appeared circular and was the size of a basketball at arm's length., The witness observed the object maneuvering at an altitude of approximately 1000 feet., The sighting lasted for about 5 to 10 minutes with no wings or tail observed., The object made no sound and was described as silver or metallic in color.
witness description: Mr. Spaur, who observed the object while off work to watch a predicted passage of Ranger VII.
